block.p: ABBOTT LABORATORIES, Abbott Park, Ill., a health care company, said its board approved a 2-for-1 stock split, and increased the company's quarterly dividend 11 percent, to 30 cents a share.

CAPITAL AUTOMOTIVE, Arlington, Va., a real estate investment trust specializing in acquiring auto dealership properties, said it sold 20 million shares for $300 million, or $15 each, in an initial public offering.
